name: textgrid-mark-tier-relations
author: sdercolin
description: Mark tier relations as entry tags. This plugin aligns the boundaries between tiers, and add it's parent entry name to the tag of the child entries.

list.name: repeater
list.label: Repeat mark
list.description: Text for indicating repetition of same text. You should make sure your texts don't contain this string.

list.name: tiers
list.label: Tier relations
list.description: Enter your tier names in the order of their hierarchy for merging, separated by `>`. For example, if you have tiers `phoneme`, `word`, `sentence`, the input would be `phoneme>word>sentence`, indicating that entries in `phoneme` tier are children of entries in `word` tier, and so on. Please note that you cannot use `>` in your tier names, and the tier names should be unique.
